roleset.name: to provide with much joy
roleset.note: OVERJOY-V NOTES: This is pretty much adjectival. (from overjoy.01-v)
OVERJOYED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from overjoyed.01-j)

role.descr: Instrument used to cause joy when separate from arg 0

example.name: Typical passive
example.text: [Both Chinese and Japanese people from all walks of life]-1 were overjoyed and excited *-1 by the success of the opening concert.
example.arg: by the success of the opening concert

example.name: Heavy-shift construction
example.text: It *EXP*-1 overjoyed them [to see their grandkids]-1.
